description:
Whitebeard orders his men to help Luffy clear a path to the execution scaffold, but someone close to the Rubber-man rises up to derail the rescue mission at the last second!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shokeidai Mokuzen! Hirakareta Ace e no Michi!!
The Scaffold at Last! The Way to Ace Has Opened!
Échafaud droit devant ! Le chemin vers Ace nous tend les bras !
Перед эшафотом! Путь к Эйсу открыт!
عند المنصّة أخيرًا! الطّريق إلى إيس مفتوحة!
処刑台目前! 開かれたエースへの道!!
